DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess safety tolerability YH14618 24 week follow-up period single administration patient degenerative disc disease .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability Efficacy YH14618 Patients With Degenerative Disc Disease
DOC.criteria: Have sign write informed consent voluntarily , prior procedure Degenerative disc disease patient age 20 year Have one symptomatic lumbar level ( L1~S1 ) confirm use radiology ( Xray , MRI and/or discogram/CT ) Have diagnose 2~3 degree MRI index modify thompson classification Oswestry diability index ( ODI ) 30 great Visual analog scale ( VAS ) 4 great Subjects unable radiological examination Have history neurological disease , herniated lumbar disc , compression fracture lumbar spinal surgery Sacroiliac joint dysfunction Have treat drug pain control within 7 day prior first administration Hypersensitivity drug Pregnant woman , nurse mother subject agree assign contraception study Participated clinical trial within 30 day prior first administration
